summary: This is an email from the Chief Psychologist at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York to an unspecified recipient, inquiring about inmate Jeffrey Epstein's mental capacity to proceed with the disciplinary process. It is dated July 23, 2019, shortly before Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email inquiry regarding his mental capacity to proceed with the disciplinary process while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Inquiry into Epstein's Mental Capacity
events.description: The Chief Psychologist at the Metropolitan Correctional Center sends an email inquiring whether inmate Jeffrey Epstein is mentally capable of proceeding with the disciplinary process.

keyFacts: On July 23, 2019, a Chief Psychologist at the Metropolitan Correctional Center inquired about Jeffrey Epstein's mental capacity to proceed with disciplinary proceedings.
The inquiry was made via email, indicating an internal assessment was being conducted regarding Epstein's fitness for process.
The document is dated just days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, making it a potentially relevant record from his final days in custody.
